title: Hooks & Eyes
description: Inspired by a true story, Hooks & Eyes begins an epic saga of one family’s trials, triumphs and tragedies, as they strive to climb the social ladder in Victorian Era England.GOLD Quality Mark"Well constructed with strong characters and an interesting storyline and is deserving of a gold standard.” To start again, Mary must leave the past behind…When grieving widow Mary Jackson moves to the town of Birmingham, she hopes to put her troubled past behind her. In need of money, and with two children to care for, she takes a job making Hooks & Eyes for the ambitious Mr Wetherby.Mr Wetherby soon decides he wants Mary as more than a worker. But when he shows an interest in her, Mary’s instinct is to run. Stung by her rejection, he tracks her down; vowing to do whatever it takes to win her heart.Questioning his motives, and yearning for the love she lost, Mary is forced to make a choice. Can she put the past behind her? And will it give her the future she hopes for?Set in Victorian England, Hooks & Eyes is Part 1 of The Ambition & Destiny Series. A captivating family saga of love, loss and betrayal.BackgroundThis novel (and the subsequent Ambition & Destiny Series) was inspired by real-life events discovered through family history research. Due to its historical nature, parts of the storyline, and all characterisation is fictitious. Names have been changed and any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.Please Note: The book is written in UK English.
author: V.L. McBeath
